# The `VPUser` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class augments <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> with operands which provide the inverse def-use edges from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a>&#39;s users to their defs. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPUser</CodeBlock>

  isLocal="true" />
</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

This class augments <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> with operands which provide the inverse def-use edges from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a>&#39;s users to their defs.

Definition at line 206 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanvalue-h">VPlanValue.h</a>.

Returns true if the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpuser">VPUser</a> uses scalars of operand <code><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a></code>.

Conservatively returns if only first (scalar) lane is used, as default.
